transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Headguard of the Witch Doctor

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 403 Versatility for 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 632,538.
(4) Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

(4) Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 358 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.
Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
